column4: got on issue with zynaddsubfx... 'zombified - calling shutdown handler' when changeing patches.. outputs disappear from JACK
i think it would depend on your hardware too justfil.. probably have driver issues
give it a try though justfil.. image it with clonezilla or something.. cant hurt anything, just dont depend on it to be your backup
what I meant is to be able to use it and make changes that will stay in the actual install
